attributes.action: Allow sea fishing as exercise in wales as long as no long travel needed to go
attributes.additional_details: the welsh government to allow people to walk to there local beach to go sea fishing alone as long as they do not drive over 3 miles and abide by all social distancing rules
attributes.background: Allow sea fishing as part of exercise in wales the welsh government want be people to go to work libraries and garden centres but one person abiding by social distancing can’t fish on there local beach

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the Welsh Government and the Senedd. 

You can find out how to petition the Senedd here:

https://petitions.senedd.wales/
